description:
Figuring out Hit’s “time-skipping” ability allows Goku to keep up—until Hit powers up! Will Goku finally face defeat, or does the Saiyan have a secret power of his own?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Gegenangriff auf den Zeitsprung? – Goku zeigt seine neue Technik!
Seichou Shita "Toki Tobashi" no Hangeki!? Deruka!? Gokuu no Arata na Waza!
The Advanced "Time-Skip" Fights Back?! Will It Come Forth? Goku`s New Technique!
成長した"時とばし"の反撃!? 出るか!? 悟空の新たな技!
